long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FoxBlock is a simple tool for boycotting top Fox News advertisers. When you visit the website or Amazon product page of a top Fox News advertiser, it displays a small notification and recommends alternative products from brands that do not advertise on Fox News.

FoxBlock is lightweight, fast, collects zero user data, and is not monetized. You control how frequently notifications show up, which brands to ignore, or you can turn it off altogether.
